body:
# **MDP-49: Treasury Transparency Project - Final Report*******Project Summary**This project aims to make the MoonDAO Treasury transparent to the general MoonDAO community. This goal will be achieved through leveraging existing finance management platforms to track and label all inflow/outflow transactions, recipient wallets.The MoonDAO financial report for 2022 has been created. The remaining budget of the closed projects has been recorded as 32,616 DAI & 1,553,666 Mooney, mostly having been returned to the treasury at the time of writing. Consola platform has been used to export and label transaction data.The original project proposal can be viewed [here](https://snapshot.org/#/tomoondao.eth/proposal/0x2ab869c1eb7833f6a9dfd2be036bdf7df1453afdc569c68e5e3648581e657825)1. **Objective 1**: Setup MoonDAO account on the selected Platform

   1. **Key Result**: Working closely with treasury management platforms to explore the current tools. Tested and setup Consola account for MoonDAO 

      1. **Member(s)**: Luffy

      2. **Results**: <https://app.consola.finance/> (Send me your email address for the access)

      3. **Score:** 

      4. **Learnings:** There are a couple of finance tool out there for DAOs, but they are exploring right now. The products include many bugs and change quickly. We should keep an eye on this and shouldn’t spend too much effort on a single platform. 

      5. **Maintenance**: The new transaction will be displayed automatically, however, it needs someone to label the transactions and add new project wallets. This task should be done monthly or quarterly. 2) **Objective #2**: Keep MoonDAO treasury transparent

   1. **Key Result**: Labeled & reviewed all translation data over the past year [Transaction data](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wYxxI_-lAn3Rr5uDZcvtg6yCQ-XS3lwt/edit#gid=45692109) . Created [MoonDAO Treasury Report 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mgka4_S9_UfS8wbx5Pgx9RoBxZv7d1Eq/edit). 

      1. **Member(s)**: Luffy, Pablo 

      2. **Results**: as above. 

      3. **Score:** 

      4. **Learnings:** Treasury transparent report should be done quarterly. It is difficult to track back transactions that happened a long time ago. 

      5. **Maintenance**: No

   2. **Key Result**: Follow-up the closed projects to **return 32,616 DAI & 1,553,666 Mooney** to MoonDAO treasury. 

      1. **Member(s)**: Luffy, Pablo 

      2. **Results**: as above. 

      3. **Score:** 

      4. **Learnings:** Project stewards should return excess funds to the Treasury once the project is completed. 

      5. **Maintenance**: No

# **Team Member Contributions**

# **Non-Bounty Contributions****@Luffy** * Working closely with treasury management platforms to explore the current tools

* Tested and setup Consola account for MoonDAO

* Labeled & reviewed all translation data over the past year

* Created [MoonDAO Treasury Report 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mgka4_S9_UfS8wbx5Pgx9RoBxZv7d1Eq/edit)

* Follow-up the closed projects to **return 32,616 DAI & 1,553,666 Mooney** to MoonDAO treasury. **@pmoncada** * Reviewed  [MoonDAO Treasury Report 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mgka4_S9_UfS8wbx5Pgx9RoBxZv7d1Eq/edit)

* Supported labeling the Projects multisign wallets

* Follow-up the EN Marketing project to return the budget
